comments.body: This can be slightly simpler if you do a `if not ... exit 1` but I don't have a strong preference.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\tsl\robin_map.h (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\cmake\tsl_robin_mapConfig.cmake (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\cmake\tsl_robin_mapConfigVersion.cmake (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]

about:
